UK Resident: T1 - UK VAT chargeable at 20% if artist is registered for UK VAT
Resident outside of UK: T3 - Promoter accounts for UK VAT under reverse charge

UK Resident: T0 - no VAT charge / Outside scope of UK VAT, 0%
Resident outside of UK:
T0 - no VAT charge / Outside scope of UK VAT, 0%.
**If promoter is in the EU, they need to account for reverse charge at local rate (T3).
** If promoter is non-EU, then local rules may apply.
**If the artist is registered in the same country as the promoter, local VAT may be applicable.
